#summary Books and online materials, recommended for participants to get met with.

= Recommended reading =
 * [http://www.cs.indiana.edu/~dyb/pubs/tr356.pdf Writing hygienic macros in Scheme with syntax-case] -- overview of low level macro facilities in Scheme.
 * [http://www.shido.info/lisp/idx_scm_e.html Yet Another Scheme Tutorial] reasonable introduction to scheme for newcomers.
 * [http://people.csail.mit.edu/jaffer/r4rs_toc.html R4RS] "Our" standard.

= Classical books =
 * [http://books.google.ru/books/about/Compilers.html?id=dIU_AQAAIAAJ&redir_esc=y Dragon book]
 * [http://mitpress.mit.edu/sicp/full-text/book/book.html Structure and interpretation of computer programs] (SICP)
